titles: A friends aduice: in an excellent ditty, concerning the variable changes in this world. To a pleasant new tune.
author: Campion, Thomas, 1567-1620.
publisher: Printed by the assignes of Thomas Symcock,
notes: Place and date of publication suggested by STC.
Verse: "What if a day or a month, or a yeare ..."
In two parts, separated for mounting; woodcuts at head of each part.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
